org.apache.flink.runtime.client

类 JobListeningContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.client.JobListeningContext

  • public final class JobListeningContext
extends java.lang.Object
    The JobListeningContext holds the state necessary to monitor a running job and receive its results.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private akka.actor.ActorSystem actorSystem
      ActorSystem for leader retrieval
      private java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader
      The class loader (either provided at job submission or reconstructed when it is needed
      private Configuration configuration
      Flink configuration for initializing the BlobService
      private HighAvailabilityServices highAvailabilityServices
      Service factory for high availability services
      private akka.actor.ActorRef jobClientActor
      The JobClientActor which handles communication and monitoring of the job
      private JobID jobID
      The Job id of the Job
      private scala.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Object> jobResultFuture
      The Future which is completed upon job completion
      private org.slf4j.Logger LOG 
      private scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration timeout
      Timeout used Asks

      • getJobID

        public JobID getJobID()
        返回:
        The Job ID that this context is bound to.

      • getJobResultFuture

        public scala.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Object> getJobResultFuture()
        返回:
        The Future that eventually holds the result of the execution.

      • getJobClientActor

        public akka.actor.ActorRef getJobClientActor()
        返回:
        The Job Client actor which communicats with the JobManager.

      • getTimeout

        public scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration getTimeout()
        返回:
        The default timeout of Akka asks

      • getClassLoader

        public java.lang.ClassLoader getClassLoader()
                                     throws JobRetrievalException
        The class loader necessary to deserialize the result of a job execution, i.e. JobExecutionResult or Exceptions
        返回:
        The class loader for the job id
        抛出:
        JobRetrievalException - if anything goes wrong

                            throws JobRetrievalException
        抛出:
